projects_dashboard: Inventory management application for the programming diploma course at UTN. The application allows for stock management, product creation, handling a shopping cart with price, tax, and shipping calculations, transaction analysis, tax management, and managing multiple accounts. It includes low stock notifications and is open source.
projects_inventory: Web application for inventory control of a school institution. I was responsible for the frontend, documentation, and DevOps tasks. The application, implemented on a self-hosted server with CI/CD for automatic updates, allowed teachers to control the school inventory and locate items in different classrooms. Everything was created from scratch, including emails and authentication. The SCRUM methodology was used.
